title: Dale and the Golden Nugget - A Short Love Story
description: Dale and the Golden Nugget - A Short Love StoryDale is sure that his plan is fool proof; steal the 3rd gold nugget discovered in the California gold rush, pour his heart out to Darla the love of his life and leave their small mountain town in the dust. The heist is the first big idea Dale has ever had and the first big move he has ever made. Despite his careful planning the heist goes hysterically haywire putting the happy ending to his townie fairytale in peril.Download for Kindle
author: Michael Bartolomei
